name: se-search-execution-function
description: Search and find new deals that matched the buyer needs

scripts.package: rm -rf dist && npm test && npm run package-prepare && cd dist && 7z a package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: mkdir dist && cp -r aws common config model service tests dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && cp index.js dist/ && cp app.js dist/ && cp buildspec.yml dist/
